blog.name: roboticonography

queer non-binary fanboy, writer, illustrator. he/they.

Made weak by time and fate, but strong in will
To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.

summary: Pepper Potts Gets a Life (complete)
title: Pepper Potts Gets a Life (complete)
body:
Title: Pepper Potts Gets a Life

Relationship: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark

Rating: T

Word Count: 6.5K

Summary: Post-IM1, Pepper decides it’s time to stop obsessing over Tony and get a life of her own. It doesn’t go quite the way she planned.

Written for Pepperony Week 2018.

Additional notes: It’s been years since I wrote something focusing on this pairing. Here’s hoping the magic is still there!

Read the story (AO3)

summary: I have a fic idea, but I need help from some of the comic lovers here. Can anyone reference (comic or pics in any universe) of...
body:
I have a fic idea, but I need help from some of the comic lovers here. Can anyone reference (comic or pics in any universe) of how Howard treated Tony? I want to be accurate, but it also plays a key role in my idea.

Thanks!!

summary: From the Outside, Looking in - LadyAriadna - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
title: From the Outside, Looking in - LadyAriadna - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/?
Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker, May Parker (Spider-Man), Pepper Potts
Additional Tags: Father-Son Relationship, Friendship, Co-Parenting, Canon Compliant, Not Beta Read, Parenthood, Parent-Child Relationship, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Iron Dad, spiderson, Pepperony - Freeform
Series: Part 3 of Towards Infinity
Summary:

Stories of Tony and Peter’s father-son relationship from the perspective of the people around them.

Chapter 2 now up!

Chapter Title: Pepper Potts

Excerpt:

Despite her initial reaction, she’s happy Peter was able to worm his way through Tony’s facade and drew out the real man inside the armor; the man she fell in love with - the man the rest of the world did not see or refused to see.

summary: Marvel Characters as things I’ve heard at comic con
body:
Marvel Characters as things I’ve heard at comic con

Tony Stark: “Oof that’s a lot of money, I want it.”

Steve Rogers: “Just seems like communist propaganda but okay.”

Clint Barton: “I’m hungry and wanna go to bed.”

Bruce Banner: “I love you nerds.”

Rocket: “you ready to watch me die.”

Peter Parker: *just crying*

Natasha Romanoff: “once again, I don’t care.”

Thor: “I was deeming you dead.”

Loki: “fucking normies”

Scott Lang: “okay but like what the fuck.”

Peter Quill: “and this is why I don’t leave the house.”

Groot: “I am groot.”

Nick Fury: “Fucking idiots.”

Also Peter Parker: “110% chance I’m gonna cry.”

reblog.comment:

summary: Love's Perfect Ache
title: Love's Perfect Ache
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2w1wKPh

by SuperNova53

Living in the Avenger’s Compound gets lonely without Tony there. Luckily he always seems to come back just at the right moment - with strawberries… And champagne..

summary:
Starker AU The good doctor 🏥🚑💉💊🍒
El Dr.Peter Parker es el nuevo residente en el departamento de cirugía en San José St....
body:
Starker AU The good doctor 🏥🚑💉💊🍒

El Dr.Peter Parker es el nuevo residente en el departamento de cirugía en San José St. Bonaventure Hospital, recomendado por su mentor y tambien presidente en el hospital, Dr. Stephen Strange.

Forma parte del grupo de residentes a cargo del talentoso cirujano Dr.Tony Stark, que notara el gran potencial en el joven residente y el porque debería permancer ahí a pesar de las dificultades que pueda tener.

blog.name: driftingtonystark
blog.title: i love you 3000
blog.description:
genius billionaire playboy philanthropist
  writing ● graphics

summary: Advice (Peter & Tony)
title: Advice (Peter & Tony)
body:
Pairing: None

Word Count: 458

Warnings: None

A/N: This is set in a world where Infinity War never happens and all the Civil War drama has been solved. The hardest things Peter has had to face here are the Vulture and his Spanish quizzes

MASTERLIST 

Tony and Peter were working on upgrades to the Spiderman suit when Peter

stopped and turned to Tony, “Mr Stark, can I ask you a question?”

“Just did kid,” he joked. “Sure thing, ask away.”

“How do I ask MJ to go out on a date with me?” Peter spoke so fast that Tony could just barely make out what he was saying. He didn’t really know what to say. To be honest, he was honored that Peter would even come to him for advice in the first place. He must’ve not said anything for too long though, because Peter was already backtracking and apologizing for making him uncomfortable.

“No no kid, you didn’t say anything wrong, I’m just really glad you trust me enough to ask me for advice.” After the whole ‘Vulture Incident’, Tony had decided he wanted to be more involved in Peter’s life. Between Accords meetings and reuniting the Avengers, Tony spent time with Peter. He’d been to all of his decathlon competitions, had him over at the compound every other week, and had a weekly dinner date with him and his aunt. Now, a year later, he cared for Peter like he was his own child.

“Of course I trust you Mr Stark—”

“Tony,” he reminded the younger man.

“—Tony; you’re like the only adult male figure I have in my life that I can talk to about stuff like this,” explained Peter.

“You know I’ve really only been in one serious relationship right?” He said, referring to Pepper.

“And now you’re marrying her. So you must’ve done something right; I just don’t want to make a fool out of myself. I really like her Tony, and I think she might like me back, but I don’t know how to tell her that I like her like that.”

“The best advice I can give you is to just be yourself and talk to her. From what you’ve told me, she isn’t the type of girl who wants the grand gesture.” Peter nodded affirmatively, “So just talk to her, let her know you’re interested by paying attention. Don’t pretend to be interested, be interested; if you have to pretend then you don’t actually like her as much as you think you do.”

“Wow Tony, that actually was great advice. Thank you.”

“They don’t call me a genius for nothing kid. Make sure to let me know how it goes when you ask her out. I’ll pay for the date, you can go anywhere you want. But, if she breaks your heart she can expect a visit from Iron Man while she’s sleeping.”

“Tony,” whined Peter, stretching out the y sound.

“You know I’m just kidding Pete. Now, how about this for web-shooter combo number 976?”

TAGS ARE OPEN FOR MY PERMANENT TAGLIST AND FOR PETER & TONY SPECIFICALLY

Permanent tags: @bucky-smiles
